Ross-on-Wye, Herefordshire, England, UK Ref: Merthyr Historian, vol 18, available at Merthyr Tydfil Central Library. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. March: 1st Thompsons Works, 2nd Troedyrhiw 6 bands competed.
